scopecontent.p: Letters making arrangements for Dorothy Wrinch to visit Max Bergmann.

scopecontent.head: Webb, John L
scopecontent.p: Requests for reprints.

scopecontent.head: Weed, Lyle A.
scopecontent.p: Letters requesting samples of papain from Max Bergmann's lab.

scopecontent.head: Weiss, Charles
scopecontent.p: General correspondence between Max Bergmann and Charles Weiss. Requests for chemical samples. Weiss asks Bergmann to recommend a chemist for the Mount Zion Hospital. Arrangements for a meeting.

scopecontent.head: Weissberger, Arnold, No. 1
scopecontent.p: General correspondence between Max Bergmann and Arnold Weissberger of the Eastman Kodak Company. Letters concerning chemicals and experiments.

scopecontent.head: Weissberger, Arnold, No. 2
scopecontent.p: General correspondence between Max Bergmann and Arnold Weissberger of the Eastman Kodak Company. Letters discuss different preparations of chemicals for experimental purposes. An invitation for Max Bergmann to speak at the Rochester Division of the American Chemical Society in 1941.

scopecontent.head: Weiz, Ernestine
scopecontent.p: Letters concerning employment oppurtunities for Weiz. Curriculum vitae and letters of recommendation included.

scopecontent.head: Wells, H. E.
scopecontent.p: Requests for Max Bergmann to give a series of lectures. Invitation declined.

scopecontent.head: West, Randolph
scopecontent.p: Correspondence concerning the Harvey Lecture given by Max Bergmann in October, 1935.

scopecontent.head: Weston Electrical Instrument Corporation
scopecontent.p: Bills for service.

scopecontent.head: Whistler, Roy L.
scopecontent.p: Correspondence concerning a position in Max Bergmann's lab.

scopecontent.head: White, Abraham, No. 1
scopecontent.p: General correspondence between Max Bergmann and Abraham White. Exchange of reprints. Discussion of experiments. Letters of introduction. Several letters discussing employment in the United States for refugee scientists.

scopecontent.head: White, Abraham, No. 2
scopecontent.p: Personal correspondence between Max Bergmann and Abraham White. Letters discussing Bergman's illness.

scopecontent.head: White, Abraham, No. 3
scopecontent.p: General correspondence between Max Bergmann and Abraham White. Requests and exchange of reprints. Letters discussing experiments.

scopecontent.head: White, Julius
scopecontent.p: Requests for reprints. An application to work in Max Bergmann's lab.

scopecontent.head: Whitmore, F. C.
scopecontent.p: Correspondence concerning a position at Max Bergmann's lab. Exchange of chemical samples.

scopecontent.head: Who's Who
scopecontent.p: Notice of Max Bergmann's inclusion in the second edition of the "The Chemical Who's Who."

scopecontent.head: Who's Who in the East
scopecontent.p: Notice of Max Bergmann's inclusion in the publication "Who's Who in the East." Includes biographical questionnaires.

scopecontent.head: Wilhelm, R. H.
scopecontent.p: Invitation to Max Bergmann to give a lecture at a symposium on proteins at Princeton in March 1941.

scopecontent.head: Williams, Dean, No. 1
scopecontent.p: Correspondence between Max Bergmann and Dean Williams of the "Journal of the American Leather Chemists Association." Letters concern articles and papers reviewed by Bergmann.

scopecontent.head: Williams, Dean, No. 2
scopecontent.p: Correspondence between Max Bergmann and Dean Williams of the "Journal of the American Leather Chemists Association." Letters concern articles and papers reviewed by Bergmann.

scopecontent.head: Williams, Jonathan W.
scopecontent.p: Williams invites Max Bergmann to speak at an American Chemical Society meeting in Milwaukee, September 1939.

scopecontent.head: Williams, Roger J.
scopecontent.p: Requests for reprints and chemical samples.

scopecontent.head: Williams and Wilkins Company
scopecontent.p: Letters concerning Max Bergmann's subscription to the Journal of Organic Chemistry.

scopecontent.head: Winnick, Theodore
scopecontent.p: Requests for reprints. An application to work in Max Bergmann's lab.

scopecontent.head: Winternitz, Milton C.
scopecontent.p: Correspondence concerning Winternitz' work on proteins at the Yale University Medical School.

scopecontent.head: Wizinger, R.
scopecontent.p: Correspondence concerning the situation of a Dr. Breyer who is stuck in Zurich and wishes to go to the United States. Curricculum vitae included.

scopecontent.head: Wolfrom, M. L.
scopecontent.p: Correspondence between Max Bergmann and M. L. Wolfrom. Wolfrom writes to Bergmann looking for a refugee scientist to fill a position at Ohio State University.

scopecontent.head: Woolley, D. W.
scopecontent.p: Exchange of reprints. Max Bergmann nominates Woolley to the American Society of Biological Chemists.

scopecontent.head: Wormall, A.
scopecontent.p: Requests for reprints.

scopecontent.head: Wreschner, Marie
scopecontent.p: Correspondence concerning Wreschner's immigration from Germany to the United States. Curriculum vitae included.

scopecontent.head: Wrinch, Dorothy M.
scopecontent.p: Correspondence between Max Bergmann and Dorothy Wrinch. Request for reprints. A letter from Bergmann addressing his concern that Wrinch had failed to cite his work in several of her papers.

scopecontent.head: Wu, Hsien
scopecontent.p: Correspondence concerning the arrangements for Chi-yuan Chou's visit to the United States.

scopecontent.head: Wuertz, A. J.
scopecontent.p: An order for chemical samples.

scopecontent.head: Wuest, H. M.
scopecontent.p: General correspondence between Max Bergmann and H. M. Wuest. Letters of recommendation. Invitations. Requests for chemical samples.

scopecontent.head: Wycoff, Ralph W. G.
scopecontent.p: Requests for reprints from Max Bergmann's lab.

scopecontent.head: Y - Misc.
scopecontent.p: Requests for reprints. Cross references to other files.

scopecontent.head: Z - Misc.
scopecontent.p: Requests for reprints. Invitation to an exhibit on "The Contax in Science and Industry."

scopecontent.head: Zamecnik, Paul C., No. 1
scopecontent.p: General correspondence between Max Bergmann and Paul Zamecnik. Letters discussing the work of both men. Zamecnik writes expressing his interest in a posittion at Bergmann's lab. Bergmann writes Zamecnik a letter of recommendation. Exchange of chemical samples and reprints. Personal letters.

scopecontent.head: Zamecnik, Paul C., No. 2
scopecontent.p: Letters concerning employment in Max Bergmann's lab.

scopecontent.head: Zechmeister, L.
scopecontent.p: General correspondence between Max Bergmann and L. Zechmeister. Zechmeister writes to Bergmann informing him of his appointment at the California Institute of Technology. Letters discussing Bergmann's illness.

scopecontent.head: Zellenka, Gertrude
scopecontent.p: Correspondence concerning employment for Zellenka in the United States.

scopecontent.head: Zerner, E.
scopecontent.p: Correspondence concerning employment for Zerner in the United States.

scopecontent.head: Zimmerli, W. F.
scopecontent.p: General correspondence between Max Bergmann and W. F. Zimmerli.

scopecontent.head: Zittle, C. A.
scopecontent.p: Correspondence concerning employment in Max Bergmann's lab.
